item.title: Unconditional stability of a recurrent neural circuit implementing divisive normalization
item.description: Biologically-inspired ORGANICs neural circuit achieves dynamic divisive normalization, ensuring unconditional stability and seamless backpropagation training for high-dimensional recurrent networks.
